pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau held a meeting today with his counterpart Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel on the margins of the World Economic Forum annual meeting in Davos, Switzerland.

The two leaders discussed the regional security situation in the Middle East, including the status of the peace process. They specifically discussed Iranâ€™s position within the region.

Prime Minister Trudeau and Prime Minister Netanyahu discussed economic ties between their countries and the role of new information technologies in transforming economies. The leaders also discussed the importance of a modernized Canada-Israel Free Trade Agreement, which would benefit both Canadian and Israeli companies.
